update.description: [editor] Add inverse layer order option (click on menu File->Setting->Layer order->Photoshop [editor] Hit shift or control to select multiple items in layout tab [editor] Implement group and ungroup operation (Click on menu Edit -> Group with Sprite / Group with LayoutGroup / Ungroup) [editor] When a texture is missing, it will load the default empty texture and show errors in a popup [editor] Drag objects in layout tab will keep them in the same position [editor] While holding space key, DocumentManager will enter dragMode [editor] Add tooltip support [editor] Fix duplicate should copy and paste not in place [template] Fix DropShaderFilter alpha not being saved when alpha=1
